summary: I was livestreaming and created this, I had hoped to finish it during the stream but I did not have enough time so the textures are pretty lousy and there is no new blood mesh. I will get to this as soon as I have the time and energy. Just uploading for fun :)
descriptionHtml:
I was livestreaming and created this, I had hoped to finish it during the stream but I did not have enough time so the textures are pretty lousy and there is no new blood mesh. I will get to this as soon as I have the time and energy. Just uploading for fun :) The stream challenge was to create a mod in 3 hours and this was what I made...

The name was voted in the comments so I have no idea what it means but I might come up with a backstory sometime.

You obtain it via the console, just type help ghullance crusher and you will get a id number. type player.additem and the item id you got and then type how many you want.
author: HumiIiation
